name: reprieve
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an official order that stops or delays the punishment, especially by death, of a prisoner: He was sentenced to death but was granted a last-minute reprieve.
an escape from a bad situation or experience: The injection provided a temporary reprieve from the pain.
